name: Pottery Expert Agent
short_description: AI pottery expert powered by RAG with 28,856+ pottery knowledge embeddings
description: An intelligent pottery assistant that provides expert guidance on ceramic arts, techniques, materials, glazing, firing methods, and more. Powered by a rich vector database with over 28,000 pottery-related knowledge embeddings from authoritative sources.
author: Francis Gbohunmi

tools.name: potterySearchTool
tools.description: Searches a rich Pinecone vector database containing 28,856 pottery knowledge embeddings. Returns relevant information about pottery techniques, materials, history, and practices.

query.description: The pottery-related question or topic to search for

example_queries: What are the different types of clay used in pottery?
How do I prepare clay for wheel throwing?
What is the raku firing technique?
Explain the difference between earthenware and stoneware
What are common pottery glazing techniques?
How do I fix cracks in pottery?
What temperature should I fire porcelain at?
